true ? " block" : " noblock"; const myRef = useRef(); const [searchValue, setSearchValue] = useState(""); const [surah, setSurah] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { if (searchValue !== null && searchValue.length >= 1) { const matchingSurahs = allSurahsArabicWithId.filter((item) => item.name.includes(searchValue) ); setSurah(matchingSurahs); } else { setSurah([]); } }, [searchValue]); const handleClick = (number) => { setSurahNumber(number); navigate("/read-surah"); setSearchBlock(false); }; const handleAyahClick = () => { navigate("/read-ayah"); setSearchBlock(false); }; return (
setSearchBlock(false)}> X
